duties_responsibilities.duty: Manage all facets of the daily field operations of a general construction company.
Coordinate with Project Managers and oversee all aspects of project activities, including scheduling, design, construction, and installation.
Continuous improvement of the customer experience.
Lead a collaborative field planning process.
Coordinate jobsite logistics with your team and maintain professional relationships with all stakeholders.
Perform other duties as assigned by Regional Director.

education_certification.credential: Bachelors in a related field of study preferred. Experience is taken into consideration.
